title: Logo NITYA
content:
Good morning everybody !  
Could you help me with this logo. It seems to be a “classic” font.  
Thanks for your help !  
Best regards

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619055921/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_50.jpg) | 15.11 KB |
author: lepetitfakir lo...

comments.content: The logo reminds me of [Bauer Text Initials](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619055921/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=PF00001101P2), [Schneidler Initials](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619055921/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/schneidler-initials/), [Shàngó](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619055921/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/shango/), and [Shàngó Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619055921/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/shango-gothic/).

Yes... with a non-serif style...  
Thanks Akira. maybe it’s a custom font ?

I think Akira picked the right source. I just think they edited out the serifs. [Shango Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619055921/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/shango/) looks just about right as a starting place.

- Mike Yanega

Or slightly tweaked Cosmos Light.

Nick Cooke
